description:
Upward Mobility's FINRA Series 6 Exam Prep app for Palm webOS contains 325 focused questions to thoroughly prepare you for Investment Company Products/Variable Contracts Limited Representative exam.  Each question is paired with a concise yet thorough explanation to ensure comprehension of the material.  All content was created exclusively for Upward Mobility by a finance professor at a top university with comprehensive knowledge of the material on the exam and edited by Samantha Tanzer, an Upward Mobility associate with a background in financial regulation.   *  The app has both a "study mode" where each question is followed by a clear explanation of the answer and a "test mode" where the users can simulate the exam experience and test their recall ability.
  ||  
This app covers all of subject areas presented on the Series 6 exam, including:
Securities Markets, Investment Securities, and Economic Factors
  ||  
Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
